english.segment1: I once was lost, but now I'm found. I once was lost, but now I'm found. So far away, but I'm home now. I once was lost, but now I'm found. And now my lifesong sings
english.segment2: I once was blind, but now I see. I once was blind, but now I see. I don't know how, but when He touched me. I once was blind, but now I see
english.segment3: And now my lifesong sings. And now my lifesong sings. And now my lifesong sings
english.segment4: I once was dead, but now I live. I once was dead, but now I live. Now my life to You I give. Now my life to You I give. Now my life to You I give
english.segment5: Hallelujah. Hallelujah. Let my lifesong sing to You. REPEAT 3x
